code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/missingpersondetails.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MissingPersonDetails(){const[person,setPerson]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const{id}=useParams();useEffect(()=>{const fetchPerson=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("/api/missing-persons/{id}");setPerson(response.data);console.log("The response is",response.data);setLoading(false);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching missing person details:',error);setError('Failed to load missing person details.
